CustomField.description: Product Classification (‘New Business’, ‘Cross-Sell’, ‘Win Back’, ‘Renewal’ and ‘Growth’) is essential enterprise information that is used for accurate sales pipeline and commission calculation. This classification (apart from Growth) is auto calculated.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Product Classification (‘New Business’, ‘Cross-Sell’, ‘Win Back’, ‘Renewal’ and ‘Growth’) is essential enterprise information that is used for accurate sales pipeline and commission calculation. This classification (apart from Growth) is auto calculated.
CustomField.label: Classification
